original_title: Nina & the Stolen Children of Timor Leste
overview: An estimated four thousand Timorese children were forcibly taken away from their families during the Indonesian occupation. Decades later, many families in Timor-Leste continue to search for their missing children. AJAR’s short documentary film “Nina & The Stolen Children of Timor-Leste” depicts AJAR’s work in reuniting a group of ‘stolen’ children (now adults) with their families.
title: Nina & the Stolen Children of Timor Leste
